text:
9.5. Multivariate Multi-step LSTM Models 155
Listing 9.81: Example of an Stacked LSTM for multi-step forecasting for a dependent series.
Running the example ﬁts the model and predicts the next two time steps of the output
sequence beyond the dataset. We would expect the next two steps to be: [185, 205]. It is a
challenging framing of the problem with very little data, and the arbitrarily conﬁgured version
of the model gets close.
